body.p:
Louisville 9th July '61
To
Honl B Magoffin
Govr of Ky.

I was Sheriff at the time of the conviction of young Hawkins for stabbing with a deadly weapon and will hereby remark that from all I was able to learn of the case I am decidedly of the Opinion that he ought not to have been convicted; thereupon should be at once restored to liberty.

Yours with dear respect
W. S D Megowan
